data.name: Jose Valentin Salina
data.Profile: Software engineer with more than 4 years of experience developing: Web Applications, Web Services and Mobile Apps, to enterprises in the Educational, Insurance and Financial sector. I participate in projects from the begining, making the requirements gathering and project design, to the end, putting to production and keeping the Final Product. Using relational (MySQL, Postgress, Oracle) and non-relational databases (MongoDB, Firestore, Redis) and working with Scrum and others Agile methodologies in presentials and remote teams.
